net.semanticmetadata.lire.builders

Class GlobalDocumentBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.semanticmetadata.lire.builders.GlobalDocumentBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocumentBuilder

    public class GlobalDocumentBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements DocumentBuilder
    This class creates Lucene Documents from images using one or multiple Global Features. Can also be used only for extraction.
    Author:
    Nektarios Anagnostopoulos, nek.anag@gmail.com (c) 2015 by Nektarios Anagnostopoulos, Mathias Lux, mathias@juggle.at

    • Constructor Detail

      • GlobalDocumentBuilder

        public GlobalDocumentBuilder()

      • GlobalDocumentBuilder

        public GlobalDocumentBuilder(boolean hashing)

      • GlobalDocumentBuilder

        public GlobalDocumentBuilder(boolean hashing,
                             GlobalDocumentBuilder.HashingMode hashingMode)
        Creates a GlobalDocumentBuilder with the specific hashing mode. Please note that you have to take care of the initilization of the hashing subsystem yourself.
        Parameters:
        hashing - true if you want hashing to be applied.
        hashingMode - the actual mode, eg. BitSampling or MetricSpaces.

      • GlobalDocumentBuilder

        public GlobalDocumentBuilder(boolean hashing,
                             GlobalDocumentBuilder.HashingMode hashingMode,
                             boolean useDocValues)
        Creates a GlobalDocumentBuilder with the specific hashing mode. Please note that you have to take care of the initilization of the hashing subsystem yourself. Optionally use DocValues instead of TextField implementations for storing the feature vector. Note that this cannot be read by ordinary linear searchers, but must be implemented in a different way.
        Parameters:
        hashing - true if you want hashing to be applied.
        hashingMode - the actual mode, eg. BitSampling or MetricSpaces.
        useDocValues - set to true if you want to use DocValues instead of Lucene fields.

      • GlobalDocumentBuilder

        public GlobalDocumentBuilder(java.lang.Class<? extends GlobalFeature> globalFeatureClass)

      • GlobalDocumentBuilder

        public GlobalDocumentBuilder(java.lang.Class<? extends GlobalFeature> globalFeatureClass,
                             boolean hashing)

      • GlobalDocumentBuilder

        public GlobalDocumentBuilder(java.lang.Class<? extends GlobalFeature> globalFeatureClass,
                             boolean hashing,
                             boolean useDocValues)
        Use DocValues instead of TextField implementations for storing the feature vector. Note that this cannot be read by ordinary linear searchers, but must be implmented in a different way.
        Parameters:
        globalFeatureClass -
        hashing - set to true if hashing should be performed.
        useDocValues - set to true if you want to use DocValues instead of Lucene fields.

      • extractGlobalFeature

        public GlobalFeature extractGlobalFeature(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                          GlobalFeature globalFeature)
        Images are resized so as not to exceed the DocumentBuilder.MAX_IMAGE_DIMENSION, after that the feature is extracted using the given globalFeature.
        Parameters:
        image - is the image
        globalFeature - selected global feature
        Returns:
        the input globalFeature

        Creates the feature fields for a Lucene Document without creating the document itself.

      • createDocument

        public org.apache.lucene.document.Document createDocument(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                                          java.lang.String identifier)
        Description copied from interface: DocumentBuilder
        Creates a new Lucene document from a BufferedImage. The identifier can be used like an id (e.g. the file hashFunctionsFileName or the url of the image)
        Specified by:
        createDocument in interface DocumentBuilder
        Parameters:
        image - the image to index. Cannot be NULL.
        identifier - an id for the image, for instance the filename or a URL. Can be NULL.
        Returns:
        a Lucene Document.
